tool_description: The diacritizator uses AI techniques to add diacritical marks to Slavic texts.
name: Linguatools Diacritizator
title: Linguatools Diacritizator

api_list.name: diacritizator
api_list.description: Adds diacritical marks to the text (provided with `q` query parameter) for the language given in `lang` path parameter.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description:
Currently supported values for the `lang` path parameter are:

- `cs` (Czech)
- `pl` (Polish)
